title: Add blog media attachment field with embed preview
scope: Add a media attachment field to blog posts with optional upload control
Store the media URL alongside blog posts
Render an audio/video embed above the blog body based on the media filename
acceptance_criteria: Admin blog editor includes an optional media upload control
Blog posts persist a media attachment URL
Public blog view embeds an audio or video player above the post body when a media URL is present
CHANGELOG.md includes an entry for this work order
risk_notes: New media uploads increase storage usage and could expose unsupported file types if validation is too loose
Embedding media without size constraints may impact page load times
rollback_plan: Remove the media attachment field and uploader, and stop rendering the media embed
